description: 14.  What should I do if I suspect that I have Ebola or somebody I know has Ebola?
title: 14.  What should I do if I suspect that I have Ebola or somebody I know has Ebola?
content: If you develop any of the above signs and symptoms within 21 days (3 weeks) of having been to a country with reported outbreak, or an ill person who had travelled to/from a country with an outbreak, immediately report to the nearest health facility for assistance. Provide this important history to the health workers.
